name: devforge-v9
description: AI-driven development platform — 60+ file generator with inline editor & diff view

scripts.check: node build.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),c=fs.readFileSync('devforge-v9.html','utf8'),m=c.match(/<script>([\\s\\S]*?)<\\/script>/g);let js='';m.forEach(s=>js+=s.replace(/<\\/?script>/g,'')+'\n');fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/_df_check.js',js);" && node --check /tmp/_df_check.js && echo '✅ Syntax OK'
scripts.open: node build.js && open devforge-v9.html || xdg-open devforge-v9.html || start devforge-v9.html

author: にしあん (Engineering no Tane Committee)
